name: The Pipal
overview:
The Pipal - www.thepipal.com Founders: Abha Mahajan, Anuj Mahajan

The Pipal - a marketplace for exclusive baby and kids products.

Little Pipal, our designer kids boutique, offers a large range of customizable kids products such as body cushions, curtains, bedding sets, quilts, crib bedding, bath ponchos and towels etc. The concept of Little Pipal products is “PERSONALIZED” and “CUSTOMIZED”. Everything can be personalized with words of your choice and customized in colours and sizes according to your specifications. The product range is quite unique and the website users have the ability to customize the product as per their choice - colours, size, motifs, personalization etc.

Our Facebook page (www.facebook.com/thepipal) features a lot of our completed projects and customer reviews.

Web: www.thepipal.com Blog: http://blog.thepipal.com Facebook: www.thepipal.com/thepipal Twitter: http://twitter.com/thepipal
